name: Cyber Evader
description:
This is my Entry for TomsMiniJam (you can look it up on twitter)

You play as this Robot jumping and evading, to reach a new highscore. The music was done in some 8-Bit keyboard app for Android in one go, so its just there to be there. But the assets are all made by me, and i quite like them (even if they are nowhere near finished). All in all it took around maby 8 - 9 hours i would guess.. but damn it would be so much more fun with music and smarter spawn timing.

Im probably gonna add some more features, like for example double jump, attacks or more and post it as like a after-Jam Version

If you would like i could also sell or upload the Assets, but im have not decided yet.

Have fun while playing,

Felix :)
